name: Metolius Upshot Belay Glasses - Unisex
description: Don't let long project-belays become a thing you dread. These glasses let you keep a close eye on your climber without straining your neck, and come with a hard case so you can throw them in your crag bag without them getting damaged.Lightweight, solid plastic frames are easy to put on or take off.High-transparency prisms aim high on the wall.Low profile nose pads fit with other eyewear.Includes hard case, lanyard and lens cloth.
